entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The fat lady is a person who guards the entrance to the common room. She asks for the password before allowing entry.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a person who shouts out the new password from behind the crowd.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is a person who has trouble remembering passwords and expresses sadness when he forgets one.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is glad to be back in the common room and feels at home.

relationships.description: The fat lady asks for the password, and Percy responds by shouting out the new password.
Neville Longbottom has trouble remembering passwords, which is evident from his sad expression when he forgets one.
Harry feels at home in the common room and is glad to be back there.
